answers.answer: The Diabetes is not under control and is causing complications with her other organs. This is very serious and I will pray that your doctor can help her. this can lead to fatty liver disease or more serious complications. I hope you take her to the Mayo Clinic asap. Your in my prayers.brooke

question: My 16 year old daughter has Diabetes and Celiac Disease.  She has always had trouble getting her Diabetes under control.  Today she just had and ultra sound done and they just called and she has an enlarged liver and enlarged kidney.....What does this mean?
title: Enlarged liver and kidney
